proposal: Diving into worlds where improvisers become heroes or hilarious undead, your adventures remind us that every epic tale needs a solid base, even if it's built on laughter. With 23 holders in the ETH network, why not expand your realm with our B2B tools? Imagine a DEX where your fans trade tokens named after your most memorable characters or a lottery where the prize could be an exclusive session with you. Let's create a universe where your community doesn't just listen to stories but becomes part of them.
